class.name: SceneReplicationConfig
class.brief_description: Configuration for properties to synchronize with a [MultiplayerSynchronizer].

method.name: add_property
method.description: Adds the property identified by the given [param path] to the list of the properties being synchronized, optionally passing an [param index]. [b]Note:[/b] For details on restrictions and limitations on property synchronization, see [MultiplayerSynchronizer].

method.name: get_properties
method.description: Returns a list of synchronized property [NodePath]s.

method.name: has_property
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the given [param path] is configured for synchronization.

method.name: property_get_index
method.description: Finds the index of the given [param path].

method.name: property_get_replication_mode
method.description: Returns the replication mode for the property identified by the given [param path]. See [enum ReplicationMode].

method.name: property_get_spawn
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the property identified by the given [param path] is configured to be synchronized on spawn.

method.name: property_get_sync
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the property identified by the given [param path] is configured to be synchronized on process.

method.name: property_get_watch
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the property identified by the given [param path] is configured to be reliably synchronized when changes are detected on process.

method.name: property_set_replication_mode
method.description: Sets the synchronization mode for the property identified by the given [param path]. See [enum ReplicationMode].

method.name: property_set_spawn
method.description: Sets whether the property identified by the given [param path] is configured to be synchronized on spawn.

method.name: property_set_sync
method.description: Sets whether the property identified by the given [param path] is configured to be synchronized on process.

method.name: property_set_watch
method.description: Sets whether the property identified by the given [param path] is configured to be reliably synchronized when changes are detected on process.

method.name: remove_property
method.description: Removes the property identified by the given [param path] from the configuration.

constants.constant: Do not keep the given property synchronized.
Replicate the given property on process by constantly sending updates using unreliable transfer mode.
Replicate the given property on process by sending updates using reliable transfer mode when its value changes.
